% chktex-file 41
\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{superscript-patch}

\NewDocumentCommand{\mesh}{}{\mathrel{\#}}
\NewDocumentCommand\smallplus{}{\mathbin{\texttt{+}}}
\NewDocumentCommand\indep{}{\mathrel{\perp\!\!\!\perp}}
\NewDocumentCommand\myrel{}{\mathrel{\overset{\textsf{a.e.}}{\sim}}}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{lllllll}
$A \mesh B     $ & $A^\mesh     $ & $A^{\mesh}     $ & $A'^\mesh     $ & $A'^{\mesh}     $ & $A''^\mesh     $ & $A''^{\mesh}     $\\
$A \smallplus B$ & $A^\smallplus$ & $A^{\smallplus}$ & $A'^\smallplus$ & $A'^{\smallplus}$ & $A''^\smallplus$ & $A''^{\smallplus}$\\
$A \indep B    $ & $A^\indep    $ & $A^{\indep}    $ & $A'^\indep    $ & $A'^{\indep}    $ & $A''^\indep    $ & $A''^{\indep}    $\\
$A \myrel B    $ & $A^\myrel    $ & $A^{\myrel}    $ & $A'^\myrel    $ & $A'^{\myrel}    $ & $A''^\myrel    $ & $A''^{\myrel}    $\\
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
